msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix bug http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-19018 Canvas causes a spark component to shrink to its minimum size upon setting the left and right styles.
Fix: During measurement always take the preferred size into account instead of the minimum size. Preserve the legacy behavior in compatibility mode.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Update action script files with asdoc version tags.
Doc Notes: Please review and update as necessary.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
* Change layout-related width/height, explicit width/height, measured width/height properties from post-scale to pre-transform. yay!
* Flex3 containers are updated to support the new behavior.
* Repeatedly scaling a component can differ from before, since we no longer accumulate rounding errors.
* The change is gated by a version flag, in compatibility mode these properties don't change.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The beginning of the open-source Flex SDK.
Populated the flex/sdk/trunk directory with an open-source subset of files from //depot/flex/sdk/...@191097 in the Faramir Perforce server. This changelist is a bit past the 3.0rc0 build.
The Ant scripts will not successfully build yet. They need to be adapted to the open-source subset.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Remove ADOBE SYSTEMS license and replace with Apache license in headers - frameworks.  A 2nd pass will be needed to get the files not handled up by the scripts.
